name: Sunset Bliss
preparation: Start by filling a shaker with ice. Pour in the vodka and orange juice. Securely close the shaker and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds. Tilt a highball glass and pour grenadine along the side to coat the bottom and create a layered effect. Gently strain the shaken mixture into the glass, allowing the orange juice and vodka to float above the grenadine layer.
backstory: Inspired by the stunning hues at sunset, the Sunset Bliss was created to capture the essence of the dwindling sunlight meeting the serene sea at the horizon. The sweet flavors aim to evoke the calm and beauty of the evening, making it a perfect cocktail to wind down a sunny day.
